name: Maga Design Group
tag_list: design, information, graphics, super, challenges, solutions, maps, visual, node, chart, communication, graph
overview:
Maga Design Group helps government agencies and commercial clients build brand power in the federal arena.

We Create culture-based branding campaigns and communications materials that energize stakeholders and bring the executive vision to life in clear and compelling terms.

Ultimately, our goal is to drive organizational performances so that government agencies clarify and increase their value to stakeholders while commercial clients improve their position in the federal marketplace.

Maga Design Group tailors corporate branding strategies and cutting-edge thought leadership to the federal sector. We specialize in transforming technical or otherwise difficult information into effective-level and mass-distribution presentations (digital, print, and video).

Our work includes executive strategy and technology roadmaps; learning maps; communications tool-kits; media planning kits; viral marketing materials; branded training materials, change management videos, and a host of other products.

Our communications materials are designed to be compelling and consistent, both visually and linguistically.
